question: Who leads the Indian delegation during the India-France Annual strategic dialogue, scheduled in New Delhi?
explanation:
India and France is set to hold their annual strategic dialogue in Delhi, as per the recent statement of the Ministry of external affairs.
National Security Adviser (NSA) Ajit Doval will lead the Indian delegation while Emmanuel Bonne, the diplomatic advisor to President Emmanuel Macron will lead the French side. Discussions on wide-ranging bilateral and global issues are expected.
